channel.title: CSP on Taha Draidia
channel.description: Recent content in CSP on Taha Draidia

item.title: Bypass Content Security Policy framing restriction rule - OLX
item.description: It’s been a while since my last post. Today I decided to share with you a bug I found on a public bug bounty program on HackerOne. You can find the original report here. This post is about a misconfiguration in CSP rule that leaves the website vulnerable to UI redressing aka clickjacking. This attack is widly used by scammer and spammers to trick users. After some recon on olx.co.za and olx.
